settings.heading: WHAT SIZES DO SMALL AFGHAN RUGS COME IN?
settings.content: Size Range: Our small Afghan rugs range from 3ft x 5ft to 4ft x 6ft, for adding a touch of elegance to compact spaces.

settings.heading: Why Choose Small Afghan Rugs?
settings.content:
Small Afghan rugs, ranging from 3ft x 5ft to 4ft x 6ft, offer a multitude of benefits:

  • Versatility: Perfect for entryways, hallways, bedrooms, and nooks. Easily refresh decor without overwhelming the space.
  • Accent Pieces: Add pops of color, texture, and warmth. Highlight areas or complement existing decor.
  • Cultural Heritage: Bring rich cultural heritage into your home. Showcase intricate designs and traditional patterns.
  • Quality and Durability: 100% wool construction ensures durability and luxury. Withstand heavy foot traffic.
  • Affordability: Enjoy handmade beauty at a more accessible price point due to compact size.

settings.heading: WHY BUY FROM CHARGUL?
settings.content:
When you purchase an Afghan rug from Chargul, you can expect:

  • Ethical Sourcing: We source directly from Afghan weavers, ensuring fair compensation and supporting local communities.
  • High-Quality Materials: Our rugs are made from premium wool and natural dyes for durability and vibrant colors.
  • Authenticity: Each hand-knotted rug is a genuine piece of Afghan heritage, crafted by skilled artisans.
  • Wide Selection: Choose from a diverse range of designs, sizes, and colors to suit your taste and decor.
  • Customer Support: Our dedicated team is always ready to assist you, ensuring a smooth shopping experience.

settings.heading: What is your shipping policy?
settings.content:
• Shipping Time: Within the US, expect your rug to arrive in 3-5 business days. International orders may take 1-3 weeks.
  • Shipping Costs: Enjoy free shipping on all orders within the United States.
  • Order Tracking: We provide a tracking number via email, allowing you to monitor your shipment's progress.

settings.heading: WHAT IS YOUR RETURN AND EXCHANGE POLICY?
settings.content:
• Returns: We offer a 30-day return policy for a full refund, provided the item is in its original condition.
  • Refunds: Once we receive the returned rug, we process refunds within 5 business days.
  • Exchanges: Take advantage of our 30-day exchange policy if you prefer a different rug.

settings.heading: Explore More
settings.content:
Discover Our Hand Knotted Afghan Rugs: Browse our exquisite collection of Hand Knotted Afghan Rugs, skillfully crafted in various sizes to suit any space:

  • Medium Afghan Rugs
  • Large Afghan Rugs
  • X-Large Afghan Rugs
  • All Afghan Rugs

Learn About the History and Artistry of Afghan Rugs: Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of Afghan rugs on our blog.
Learn About Our Story: Uncover our passion for preserving Afghan craftsmanship on our Our Story page.
FAQ: Head over to the FAQ section for answers to our most asked questions
Contact Us: Contact us for tailored guidance in finding your ideal rug.
